description: Unique ID within NEON database; an identifier for the record.
Unique identifier of the NEON domain
NEON site code
Plot identifier (NEON site code_XXX)
Identifier for the NEON subplot
Identifier for the type of data recorded: plantSpecies or otherVariables
Indicator of whether the sample contained individuals of the target taxa
Indicator of whether the sample contained other variables, such as abiotic, biotic, and non-vascular plant cover
Species code, based on one or more sources
entryValidationRules: Conditional: if (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y'): lookup table, else: null
noDataOutcomePDA: Conditional: if (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y'):fail, else: null
noDataOutcomeUI: Conditional: if (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y'): warn, else: null

description: Accepted species code, based on one or more sources
A standard term to express the determiner's doubts about the Identification
entryValidationRules: Conditional: if (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & if targetTaxonPresent='Y'): lookup table, else: null

description: Technician notes about the specific taxon; free text comments accompanying the record.
Identifier for morphospecies
Descriptor of other variables present in the sample, including abiotic, biotic, and non-vascular plant cover
noDataOutcomePDA: Conditional: if (divDataType = 'otherVariables'  & targetVariablesPresent = 'Y'): fail; else: pass
noDataOutcomeUI: Conditional: if (divDataType = 'otherVariables'  & targetVariablesPresent = 'Y'): warn; else: pass

description: Ocular estimate of cover of the index (e.g., species)
noDataOutcomePDA: Conditional: if targetTaxaPresent OR if targetVariablesPresent = 'Y': fail, else: pass
noDataOutcomeUI: Conditional: if targetTaxaPresent OR if targetVariablesPresent = 'Y': warn, else: pass

description: Indicator of whether individuals of the species in the sample are taller than 300 cm
entryValidationRules: Conditional: if (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y'): 'Y' | 'N' else: null
noDataOutcomePDA: Conditional: if (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y'): fail, else: pass
noDataOutcomeUI: Conditional: if (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y'): warn, else: pass

description: Ocular estimate of the height of the plant species
entryValidationRules: Conditional: If (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y' & heightPlantOver300cm = 'N'): 0-300, else: null
noDataOutcomePDA: Conditional: If (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y' & heightPlantOver300cm = 'N'): fail; else: pass
noDataOutcomeUI: Conditional: If (divDataType is 'plantSpecies' & targetTaxonPresent = 'Y' & heightPlantOver300cm = 'N'): warn, else: pass

description: Number of the sampling bout within a calendar year, beginning with 1
Date or date and time of measurement, observation, or collection event
The NEON document number and version where detailed information regarding the sampling method used is available; format NEON.DOC.######v?
A list of sources (concatenated and semicolon separated) used to derive the specific taxon concept; including field guide editions, books, or versions of NEON keys used.
An identifier for the technician who measured or collected the data.
An identifier for the technician who recorded the data.
An identifier for the technician who entered the data.
Technician notes; free text comments accompanying the record.
exampleEntry: Plot likely burned within last year

entryValidationRules: Conditional: if morphospeciesID Is Null: null
